title: Sanctuary on Green
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bavarian tea studio cafe at Koehn Sculptor's Sanctuary on Green overlooking the Nine Mile Creek wetlands. Provides lunches on immaculate dinnerware, spotless flatware, and sparkling goblets. Offers a macrobiotic plate that's vegan. Always as least two soups, often non-dairy. Extensive tea list. One of the owners has a workshop and gallery on the grounds that showcases his work. Reservations suggested for the lunch seating at 11:30 and 1:30.
